World.headline: Over 4 decades in Maharashtra politics: Ajit Pawar's long innings ends with dream unfulfilled

key_points: Ajit Pawar, a prominent figure in Maharashtra politics, has died.
His political career spanned over 40 years, with significant impact on the state.
The death leaves his political ambitions and dreams unfulfilled.

key_points: Ajit Pawar's funeral is scheduled for 11 AM in Baramati.

World.headline: ‘It was flying very low, suddenly it started spiralling & crashed’: Final moments of Learjet 45 that killed Ajit Pawar

World.headline: Xi sacks generals: Why turmoil may make China more dangerous, not less

key_points: The global stage is set for middle powers to exert greater influence.

World.headline: After Putin, Xi Tells US To Back Off From Iran; Khamenei Warns 'Even Small Attack Would Trigger War'

key_points: Chinese President Xi Jinping has urged the US to back off from Iran.
Iran's Supreme Leader Khamenei threatened war in response to any attack.

Technology.headline: EU wants AI to pay for using copyrighted work

key_points: The EU is considering a policy for AI to pay for copyrighted content use.
